title: Understanding Addition and Subtraction
description: In this lesson, students will learn how to solve simple addition and subtraction problems. They will explain their thinking and understand how numbers work together.

prompts.input: If you have 3 apples and you get 2 more apples, how many apples do you have now? Explain how you found your answer.
hints: Think about how many apples you started with.
What happens when you add more apples?

prompts.input: You have 5 balloons and 2 pop. How many balloons do you have left? Explain your thinking.
hints: Consider how many balloons you had before some popped.
What does it mean to take away balloons?
